string.value: Let's take the Antique to #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k.
Take the Antique you received from #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k over to #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k.

You have gone to #b#p1072008##k in #bNautilus#k at the request of #b#p9201118##k in #bHenesys#k, and have come back with the #rAntique#k from Leafre.\n\nBut the Antique looks much older than anticipated.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1000 Able to proceed to 'The Legend Has It That...' as next quest.
What happened? Did you bring the #rAntique#k I asked you to find for me?
You really brought it for me! It's even more amazing than I expected.\n\nAll that history behind this #rAntique#k. It's fantastic! Haha!

Thanks for your help.

Let's see, I want to give you a good reward!

I don't have anything to give you, but I can tell you a story. I have a story all Bowmen would be interested in hearing.

Have you heard of the #rAncient Bow#k? It's a legend that's been around #bHenesys#k for a long time.\n\nOnce upon a time, there lived a king who was known for his wisdom. His kingdom was always affluent and his people led happy lives. But, out of nowhere, a demon appeared!

The demon cast a musical spell on the people, making them do nothing but play all day. What do you think happened to a kingdom where everyone did nothing but play? There was shortage of food and people began to starve, and with that came stealing...
The kingdom was slowly being destroyed. So, the King looked through the ancient book and made a bow, which eventually defeated the demon and the kingdom became peaceful again.
Isn't it amazing that a person can make a bow to defeat a demon? It would be more amazing if the bow still existed! Of course, that wouldn't be the case, haha!
